email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Wheat - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Henry,

I hope this message finds you well. Following our recent discussion, I am pleased to provide you with a freight offer for the shipment of 12,000 MT of wheat from Vancouver to Yokohama.

Commodity: Wheat
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Vancouver
Discharge Port: Yokohama
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 45/MT
Laycan: 01-05 April 2023

Please let me know your thoughts at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
SeaBridge Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Wheat - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. USD 45/MT seems a bit high given the current market. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 42/MT? Additionally, could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Henry Wilson
Global Grains

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Wheat - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Henry,

Thank you for your prompt response. I understand your concern regarding the rate. I can offer a revised rate of USD 43/MT. The MV OCEAN BREEZE has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 200m.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Wheat - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 43/MT is more acceptable. However, we would like to extend the laycan to 07-10 April to better align with our production schedule. Could you accommodate this change?

Best regards,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Wheat - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Henry,

Extending the laycan to 07-10 April is feasible. I can confirm the revised laycan and maintain the rate at USD 43/MT. Please let me know if this works for you so we can proceed with the recap.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Wheat - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Laura,

That works for us. Please send over the recap and we will proceed with the shipment.

Best regards,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Wheat - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Henry,

Great! Please find the recap attached. Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Commodity: Wheat
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Vancouver
Discharge Port: Yokohama
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 43/MT
Laycan: 07-10 April 2023

Best regards,
Laura
